clue: There is nothing absurd about me as may be suggested by my name.
I am generally an irrational number or expression.
Square root sign is a regular companion of me.
I may be added, subtracted, multiplied or divided.
Division by me always involves rationalization.
You get the idea? An example of me is 3 + √2. Who am I?
Part of me is a regular quadrilateral.
Part of me is the solution of an equation or the invisible part of a plant.
As an exponential, my index is always ½.
For 4, I am 2 and for 49, I am 7.
